Feeding your baby
Breastfeeding and returning 
to work
Many mothers continue to 
breastfeed when they return to 
work or college. Your employer 
may wish to carry out a risk 
assessment as detailed in the 
HSE	leaflet	New and expectant 
mothers who work available at 
pha.site/working-mothers
